ComicInfo.Summary: Lone Wolvie and his boy Chris encounter a group of deadly ninjas, but they are all brought down by Chris' verbosity.
ComicInfo.Title: Mutant Beach Party! Chapter 2 The Fall on the Mutants; What If Shang-Chew Were a Fast Food Cook?; The Wacky Disciple of Doctor Deranged!; When Titans Clash!; Lone Wolvie and Chris; Hard Ball!; The Last Charlie America; Four Pages with Starchy; An Important Message for the Readers of What The--?
